name: Infinimall: Dream Job!
description:
Made for NaNoRenO 2023

Warning:
This game contains flash effects which may affect photosensitive players.

After getting dumped and dropping out of university, Mia moves into a studio apartment with her best friend, Pawnathan the cat.

At night, she becomes trapped in a cycle of dead-end work within a liminal dream mall. Can Mia escape with her new work friends, or is she just there to replace them?

  • 27,000+ words
  • 2 romanceable characters
  • 4 endings
  • An original soundtrack
  • Animated sprites and the occasional animated background / CG
  • CGs!
  • A cute cat named Pawnathan

Mia: 
Mia is a loveable loser, a well meaning mess, and a bit too neurotic for her own good. Is she all too much, or not enough?

Pawnathan the Cat:

The sweetest of beans, the fluffiest of friends, and Mia’s furry old, old man. 

Cynthia:
Cynthia manages Glitch 256, the Infinimall’s arcade. Blunt and to the point, she can come across as cold, but there’s passion behind her fiery eyes.


Oliver:
Oliver is the head of Plant and Plethora Management at the Infinimall. He’s a kind and compassionate listener, and an absolute pushover. For Oli, it’s easier to help than be helped.

Lucas Alexander: Lead writer, programmer, UI designer, arcade games logo designer

Pandora Alcorn: Lead programmer, character, background, CG & title screen artist, logo designer, sound designer, editor

pajaritia: Music

Tiera: Editor, support to the writer

Royalty free vector art from freepik.com and flaticon.com
Royalty free sound effects from pixabay.com
Kinetic Text Tags / Effects by Daniel Wattson 
View from Mia’s apartment from https://lornn.itch.io/vertical-home-backgrounds
